questions.question: In the following sentence identify Adverb.
questions.comprehension: Once when a lion , the king of the jungle , was asleep , a little mouse began running up and down on him .

questions.question: In the following sentence identify Verb (past tense).
questions.comprehension: This soon awakened the lion , who placed his huge paw on the mouse , and opened his big jaws to swallow him .
